article_title: Anthem Cyber Attack Clouds Insurer's Obamacare Bounty

article_metadata.description: An investigation by state insurance regulators into the data breach of 80 million current and former customers of health insurance giant Anthem (ANTM) comes during a period of unprecedented growth for the company thanks to the Affordable Care Act. The timing of the cyber attack and potential costly fallout in system [...]
article_metadata.author: Bruce Japsen
